messages.content: With no one Party set to win the General Election this is the first time in a generation where the person you vote for matters more than the Party.

I know that a lot of people are totally disillusioned with the way our politicians behave. If you lend me your vote and I am elected to parliament things will be different. I will be a different kind of MP.
I will go to Westminster to make sure that your voice is heard and that our local needs are right under the nose of Government. I want to make things better.
I am not interested in going to Westminster just to play Party politics. I will go to represent you on the big issues that confront our country and there are many of them.

mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: David Cameron, Ed Miliband, Nick Clegg, Nigel Farage
mentions.tacticalSituation: With no one Party set to win the General Election this is the first time in a generation where the person you vote for matters more than the Party.

issues.health: Everything from helping protect local health services

leaflet.personalStatement: I've lived here for over 30 years. This is home and I love it. That's why I've spent so many years campaigning on a whole range of issues.

politicalExperience.achievements: helping protect local health services through to fighting for justice with Joanna Lumley for our brave British Army Gurkha heroes

contactInformation.address: The Puffins, Peene, Folkestone, Kent, CT188BG
